title: All Geometry Dash 2.2 Vault Codes – March 2025
description: Find the latest All Geometry Dash 2.2 Vault codes here! Keep reading for more!
author: Shela Baxi
excerpt: Check out the latest Geometry Dash 2.2 Vault Codes for March 2025 right here! Redeem them for awesome rewards!
text: Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more. If ever a game needed redeemable codes then Geometry Dash is it. This complex musical tile game will require every small help to crack the vaults. There is a catch in the game, only the full version of the game is where you can redeem the code, the free version doesn’t have the provision to redeem codes yet.  Still, if you do have a full version of the game then you do require some freebies because you already know that you need the help in this game. The developers have added code in the latest versions of the game as before there wasn’t any provision for codes at all.  Photo: RobTop Games Below are the codes for Geometry Dash and how to redeem the codes. Lenny Lenny Icon Blockbite UFO Spooky Shy Guy icon Neverending UFO Mule Ship Ahead Wave Gandalfpotter Trail Sparky A secret coin and other in-game resources Robotop Robot (Enter Your Username) Eye Volcano – (only available in the primary vault) Wave River – (only available in the primary vault) Dark Green color Silence – (only available in the primary vault) Alternative Default Icon Darkness – (only available in the primary vault) Face Icon Hunger – (only available in the primary vault) Hungry Icon GIVEMEHELPER  Gatekeepers Cipher robot BACKONTRACK  Gatekeepers Enigma spider FINALBOSS  A True Member swing THECHICKENISREADY  Cooked ship  D4SHG30ME7RY  Nostalgia icon (Your username)This is your username in the game. Tap the Face button to the left of the Play button, and then the default name is Player. 8 16 30 32 46 84For this Geometry Dash Vault of Secrets codes, type in each number and click the Vault Keepers face. So 8>Click Face>16>Click Face>30>Click Face>32>Click Face>46>Click Face>84>Click Face. After the 84 has been entered, the code will be unlocked. Photo: RobTop Games Also, redeem the codes as quickly as possible because there are already a few codes that have expired, and given how the developers are already shy of releasing more codes it is better to use the active codes quickly and move.  How to Redeem Codes in Geometry Dash 2.2? As we have already mentioned above, you will need the full version(Paid) of the game to unlock the rewards. Apart from having the full version of the game, you are also required to unlock all three vaults of Geometry Dash 2.2 – Chamber of Time, The Vault, and The Vault of Secrets.  Here’s how you unlock the three vaults. Photo: RobTop Games The Vault of Secrets You just require 50 diamonds to unlock Steps to redeem codes via The Vault of Secrets After obtaining 50 diamonds, in the Main Menu beside the Play Button, there will be a Tool Button, tap on it. There will be an Unlocked icon on the top right corner, click on it and you will be able to redeem codes from there. The Vault You need to collect 10 Silver User Coins. Steps to redeem codes via The Vault Tap on the “Cog” icon located at the bottom of the screen. The lock icon that appeared to be locked till now will be unlocked. It is located in the top-right corner. Tap on the icon and now you are eligible to redeem codes through The Vault. The Chamber of Time Photo: RobTop Games You require 1000 Mana Orbs and 700 diamonds Steps to redeem codes via The Chamber of Time Go to the Vault of Secrets and type ‘The Challenge” in the redeemable code box. A secret quest will be unlocked that will lead you to The Chamber of Time, to progress in this quest you will need to spend 200 diamonds. Finish the challenge. Enter the basement via an orange door located in the bottom right corner of the Vaults of Secrets screen. To unlock the blue and green locks, complete the required tasks. Tap on the orange lock and then steer to the “Coming soon” screen on the main level selecting page. Tap on the blue “i” which will pop up a new UI window. Click on the ground below the text box that appears.  A door will appear and this door can only be unlocked if you own the Master Emblem. You can also purchase it in the secret shop.  Open the door and it will grant you passage to The Chamber of Time and redeem the codes.  Conclusion The process of redeeming the codes is tedious in Geometry Dash 2.2 but if you tough it out and follow our simple step-by-step procedure, you should be fine and will be able to redeem codes for rewards.  Enjoyed these Geometry Dash 2.2 codes? Then don't forget to check out our other game codes like Anime Dungeon Fighters Codes, Sword Chronicles: Awaken – Codes, and many more. She has been playing mobile games for years, and her favorite game of all time is Call Of Duty Warzone. Outside of writing, Shela holds a masters degree in information science and technology. html:
Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more.

If ever a game needed redeemable codes then Geometry Dash is it. This complex musical tile game will require every small help to crack the vaults.

There is a catch in the game, only the full version of the game is where you can redeem the code, the free version doesn’t have the provision to redeem codes yet. 

Still, if you do have a full version of the game then you do require some freebies because you already know that you need the help in this game.

The developers have added code in the latest versions of the game as before there wasn’t any provision for codes at all. 

Below are the codes for Geometry Dash and how to redeem the codes.

  • Lenny
    • Lenny Icon
  • Blockbite
    • UFO
  • Spooky
    • Shy Guy icon
  • Neverending
    • UFO
  • Mule
    • Ship
  • Ahead
    • Wave
  • Gandalfpotter
    • Trail
  • Sparky
    • A secret coin and other in-game resources
  • Robotop
    • Robot
  • (Enter Your Username)
    • Eye
  • Volcano – (only available in the primary vault)
    • Wave
  • River – (only available in the primary vault)
    • Dark Green color
  • Silence – (only available in the primary vault)
    • Alternative Default Icon
  • Darkness – (only available in the primary vault)
    • Face Icon
  • Hunger – (only available in the primary vault)
    • Hungry Icon
  • GIVEMEHELPER 
    • Gatekeepers Cipher robot
  • BACKONTRACK 
    • Gatekeepers Enigma spider
  • FINALBOSS 
    • A True Member swing
  • THECHICKENISREADY 
    • Cooked ship 
  • D4SHG30ME7RY 
    • Nostalgia icon

(Your username)This is your username in the game. Tap the Face button to the left of the Play button, and then the default name is Player.

8 16 30 32 46 84For this Geometry Dash Vault of Secrets codes, type in each number and click the Vault Keepers face. So 8>Click Face>16>Click Face>30>Click Face>32>Click Face>46>Click Face>84>Click Face. After the 84 has been entered, the code will be unlocked.

Also, redeem the codes as quickly as possible because there are already a few codes that have expired, and given how the developers are already shy of releasing more codes it is better to use the active codes quickly and move. 

How to Redeem Codes in Geometry Dash 2.2?

As we have already mentioned above, you will need the full version(Paid) of the game to unlock the rewards. Apart from having the full version of the game, you are also required to unlock all three vaults of Geometry Dash 2.2 – Chamber of Time, The Vault, and The Vault of Secrets. 

Here’s how you unlock the three vaults.

The Vault of Secrets

  • You just require 50 diamonds to unlock

Steps to redeem codes via The Vault of Secrets

  1. After obtaining 50 diamonds, in the Main Menu beside the Play Button, there will be a Tool Button, tap on it.
  2. There will be an Unlocked icon on the top right corner, click on it and you will be able to redeem codes from there.

The Vault

  • You need to collect 10 Silver User Coins.

Steps to redeem codes via The Vault

  1. Tap on the “Cog” icon located at the bottom of the screen.
  2. The lock icon that appeared to be locked till now will be unlocked. It is located in the top-right corner.
  3. Tap on the icon and now you are eligible to redeem codes through The Vault.

The Chamber of Time

  • You require 1000 Mana Orbs and 700 diamonds

Steps to redeem codes via The Chamber of Time

  1. Go to the Vault of Secrets and type ‘The Challenge” in the redeemable code box.
  2. A secret quest will be unlocked that will lead you to The Chamber of Time, to progress in this quest you will need to spend 200 diamonds.
  3. Finish the challenge.
  4. Enter the basement via an orange door located in the bottom right corner of the Vaults of Secrets screen.
  5. To unlock the blue and green locks, complete the required tasks.
  6. Tap on the orange lock and then steer to the “Coming soon” screen on the main level selecting page. Tap on the blue “i” which will pop up a new UI window.
  7. Click on the ground below the text box that appears. 
  8. A door will appear and this door can only be unlocked if you own the Master Emblem. You can also purchase it in the secret shop. 
  9. Open the door and it will grant you passage to The Chamber of Time and redeem the codes. 

Conclusion

The process of redeeming the codes is tedious in Geometry Dash 2.2 but if you tough it out and follow our simple step-by-step procedure, you should be fine and will be able to redeem codes for rewards. 

Enjoyed these Geometry Dash 2.2 codes? Then don't forget to check out our other game codes like Anime Dungeon Fighters Codes, Sword Chronicles: Awaken – Codes, and many more.

Shela has over 5 years of mobile writing experience writing for the likes of Gamer BTW and Games Vot. She has been playing mobile games for years, and her favorite game of all time is Call Of Duty Warzone. Outside of writing, Shela holds a masters degree in information science and technology.
